verses.text: My \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* is \w inditing|strong="H7370"\w* a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*: I \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* of the things which I have \w made|strong="H4639"\w* touching the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: my \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \add is\add* the \w pen|strong="H5842"\w* of a \w ready|strong="H4106"\w* \w writer|strong="H5608"\w*.\f + \fr 45.1 \ft Maschil: or, of instruction\f*\f + \fr 45.1 \ft is inditing: Heb. boileth, or, bubbleth up\f*

Thou art \w fairer|strong="H3302"\w* than the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*: \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* is \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* into thy \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*: therefore \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* thee for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w Gird|strong="H2296"\w* thy \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* upon \add thy\add* \w thigh|strong="H3409"\w*, O \add most\add* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w*, with thy \w glory|strong="H1935"\w* and thy \w majesty|strong="H1926"\w*.

And in thy \w majesty|strong="H1926"\w* \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* \w prosperously|strong="H6743"\w* \w because|strong="H1697"\w* of \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* and \w meekness|strong="H6037"\w* \add and\add* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*; and thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* shall \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee terrible \w things|strong="H3372"\w*.\f + \fr 45.4 \ft ride…: Heb. prosper thou, ride thou\f*

Thine \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* \add are\add* \w sharp|strong="H8150"\w* in the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*; \add whereby\add* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* under thee.

Thy \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add is\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*: the \w sceptre|strong="H7626"\w* of thy \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* \add is\add* a \w right|strong="H4334"\w* \w sceptre|strong="H7626"\w*.

Thou \w lovest|strong="H0157"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and \w hatest|strong="H8130"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*: therefore \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, hath \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* thee with the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* of \w gladness|strong="H8342"\w* above thy \w fellows|strong="H2270"\w*.

All thy \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* \add smell\add* of \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w*, and \w aloes|strong="H0174"\w*, \add and\add* \w cassia|strong="H7102"\w*, out of the \w ivory|strong="H8127"\w* \w palaces|strong="H1964"\w*, \w whereby|strong="H4482"\w* they have made thee \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*.

\w Kings’|strong="H4428"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \add were\add* among thy honourable \w women|strong="H3368"\w*: upon thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* did \w stand|strong="H5324"\w* the \w queen|strong="H7694"\w* in \w gold|strong="H3800"\w* of \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w*.

\w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w*, O \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, and \w consider|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*; \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* also thine own \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*;

So shall the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* greatly \w desire|strong="H0183"\w* thy \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*: for he \add is\add* thy \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*; and \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* thou him.

And the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Tyre|strong="H6865"\w* \add shall be there\add* with a \w gift|strong="H4503"\w*; \add even\add* the \w rich|strong="H6223"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w intreat|strong="H2470"\w* thy \w favour|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 45.12 \ft favour: Heb. face\f*

The \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \add is\add* all \w glorious|strong="H3520"\w* \w within|strong="H6441"\w*: her \w clothing|strong="H3830"\w* \add is\add* of \w wrought|strong="H4865"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

She shall be \w brought|strong="H2986"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in raiment of \w needlework|strong="H7553"\w*: the \w virgins|strong="H1330"\w* her \w companions|strong="H7464"\w* that \w follow|strong="H0310"\w* her shall be \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee.

With \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* and \w rejoicing|strong="H1524"\w* shall they be \w brought|strong="H2986"\w*: they shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w palace|strong="H1964"\w*.
Instead of thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* shall be thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, whom thou mayest \w make|strong="H7896"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* in all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

I will make thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* to be \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* in \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*: therefore shall the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.
